text: The 1986 Tournament Players Championship was a golf tournament in Florida on the PGA Tour, held at TPC Sawgrass in Ponte Vedra Beach, southeast of Jacksonville. It was the thirteenth Tournament Players Championship. John Mahaffey shot 71 in the final round for 275 (−13) and the win, one stroke ahead of runner-up Calvin Peete missed the 36-hole cut by two strokes, the first time a participating defending champion did not play the weekend. ==Venue== This was the fifth Tournament Players Championship held at the TPC at Sawgrass Stadium Course and it remained at . ==Field== John Adams, Isao Aoki, Kikuo Arai, George Archer, Paul Azinger, Dave Barr, Andy Bean, Chip Beck, Ronnie Black, Woody Blackburn, Phil Blackmar, Charles Bolling, Ken Brown, George Burns, Rex Caldwell, Antonio Cerda Jr., Chen Tze-chung, Bobby Clampett, Lennie Clements, Russ Cochran, Jim Colbert, Frank Conner, John Cook, Fred Couples, Ben Crenshaw, Jay Delsing, Andy Dillard, Mike Donald, Bob Eastwood, Danny Edwards, David Edwards, Brad Fabel, Nick Faldo, Brad Faxon, Keith Fergus, Ed Fiori, Raymond Floyd, Dan Forsman, David Frost, Jim Gallagher Jr., Buddy Gardner, Bob Gilder, Bill Glasson, Wayne Grady, David Graham, Hubert Green, Ken Green, Jay Haas, Gary Hallberg, Dan Halldorson, Donnie Hammond, Morris Hatalsky, Mark Hayes, Lon Hinkle, Scott Hoch, Mike Hulbert, Joe Inman, Hale Irwin, Bill Israelson, Peter Jacobsen, Barry Jaeckel, Tom Kite, Kenny Knox, Gary Koch, Billy Kratzert, Greg Ladehoff, Bernhard Langer, Wayne Levi, Bruce Lietzke, Pat Lindsey, Bob Lohr, Davis Love III, Mark Lye, Sandy Lyle, Andrew Magee, John Mahaffey, Roger Maltbie, Dick Mast, Mark McCumber, Pat McGowan, Johnny Miller, Larry Mize, Gil Morgan, Jodie Mudd, Bob Murphy, Tsuneyuki Nakajima, Larry Nelson, Jack Nicklaus, Greg Norman, Tim Norris, Andy North, Mac O'Grady, Mark O'Meara, David Ogrin, Arnold Palmer, Steve Pate, Corey Pavin, Calvin Peete, Chris Perry, Mark Pfeil, Dan Pohl, Don Pooley, Nick Price, Tom Purtzer, Mike Reid, Larry Rinker, Loren Roberts, Bill Rogers, Clarence Rose, Dave Rummells, Bill Sander, Gene Sauers, Tom Sieckmann, Tony Sills, Jim Simons, Scott Simpson, Tim Simpson, Joey Sindelar, Jeff Sluman, J.
